question: How do I join this club?
answer: You're in! Joining our club doesn't require any formal process. Everyone is welcome to attend.

question: How do I join a team?
answer: Just by attending the workshops, you become a valued member of the team! Feel free to explore and attend workshops from as many teams as spark your interest.

question: I missed the first workshop, can i still attend other workshops?
answer: Feel free to attend any workshop that interests you, as they are not interdependent. Our officers are always available to assist you if needed. Previous workshop slides will be available as well.

question: Do workshops cater towards beginner or advanced students?
answer: Workshops cater to students of all levels, from beginners to advanced. Everyone is welcome to participate and learn.

question: How do I join the board?
answer: Board positions are announced at the end of each semester. Keep an eye out for any discord announcements!

question: Who can I reach out to for more questions?
answer: Contact is on any of our socials! Feel free to reach out directly to the President.
